Description: Ostracon, large fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393992) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393992)
